Solving a pokemon puzzle with SAT solvers

15 May 2023 • AI • puzzle

I recently came across an interesting logic puzzle found in a pokemon (unofficial) fangame. As everyone knows, Pokemon is a famous role playing game license from nintendo where your goal is to train small creatures that fight each other. While the core of pokemon gameplay is centered toward the training of pokemons, the player would encounter some logic puzzles on his way. For instance, the next image show one of these puzzles taken from pokemon emerald.
